mapper.select: SELECT l.id as houseId, f.id as favoriteId, l.address as houseAddress, l.title AS houseTitle, l.month_money AS housePrice, l.transafer_money AS shopTransferMoney, l.shop_acreage AS houseSquareMeter FROM t_house_favorite AS f INNER JOIN t_shop_lease AS l ON f.favorite_id = l.id WHERE f.uid = #{query.uid} AND favorite_type = 1 limit #{page},#{size}

SELECT f.id AS favoriteId, l.id AS houseId, l.house_title AS houseTitle, l.house_address AS houseAddress, l.house_price AS housePrice, l.house_square_meter AS houseSquareMeter FROM t_house_favorite AS f JOIN t_house_lease AS l ON f.favorite_id = l.id WHERE f.uid = #{query.uid} AND f.favorite_type = 2 limit #{page},#{size}
